concept.itemName: Assess current layout, plumbing, and electrical systems

desc.spec: Conduct an inspection of the existing plumbing and electrical setup.
desc.desc: Identify potential issues that may need to be addressed during the renovation.

concept.itemName: Measure the space for new fixtures (toilet, sink, bathtub/shower, etc.)

desc.spec: Accurately measure all dimensions of the bathroom.
desc.desc: Ensure the placement of new fixtures is feasible within the space.

concept.itemName: Choose a design style (modern, traditional, contemporary, etc.)

desc.spec: Select a style that complements the rest of the house.
desc.desc: This will guide choices for tiles, colors, fixtures, and overall design.

concept.itemName: Plan the selection of materials (tiles, paint, vanity, fixtures)

desc.spec: Decide on materials for each part of the bathroom.
desc.desc: Consider durability, aesthetic appeal, and budget.

desc.spec: Finalize paint colors, tile choices, and finish materials.
desc.desc: Ensure all finishes align with the chosen design style.

working.itemName: Create a draft for the bathroom tiles and structure

desc.spec: Draft a detailed layout of the tile design and structure arrangement.
desc.desc: Ensure all elements fit together aesthetically and functionally.

desc.spec: Delegate responsibilities to relevant team members.
desc.desc: Coordinate efforts among different trades (plumbers, electricians, tilers, etc.).

working.itemName: Monitor progress and adjust plans as needed.

desc.spec: Track the progress of tasks according to schedule.
desc.desc: Make adjustments to the plan if any issues arise or delays occur.

working.itemName: Ensure quality control and adherence to standards.

desc.spec: Inspect completed work for quality and accuracy.
desc.desc: Ensure work follows construction codes and safety regulations.

working.itemName: Develop detailed technical drawings and schematics.

desc.spec: Produce precise, scaled drawings for the bathroom layout.
desc.desc: Include electrical wiring, plumbing, and fixture placements.

working.itemName: Prepare final drawing packages for approval and distribution.

desc.spec: Final drafts of technical documents are created for approval.
desc.desc: Prepare drawings and schedules for contractors and approvals.

build.itemName: Shut off water and electricity supply to the bathroom.

desc.spec: Ensure the water and power systems are completely disconnected.
desc.desc: This is crucial for safety before beginning work.

build.itemName: Remove old fixtures: toilet, sink, bathtub, showerhead, faucets.

desc.spec: Carefully remove old fixtures to avoid damage to plumbing or electrical systems.
desc.desc: Ensure proper disposal of old materials.

build.itemName: Take down existing tiles, wallpaper, or wall coverings.

desc.spec: Remove all existing finishes to expose the underlying structure.
desc.desc: Prepare walls and floors for new installation.

build.itemName: Relocate or install new plumbing lines for toilet, sink, shower/bathtub, and other fixtures.

desc.spec: Install plumbing according to the new bathroom layout.
desc.desc: Ensure proper water flow and drainage.

build.itemName: Install new drains and water supply lines as required by the new layout.

desc.spec: Install drains, water supply lines, and ensure they align with the new fixture locations.
desc.desc: Test for leaks and functionality.

build.itemName: Re-wire the bathroom for new lighting, outlets, and ventilation fan.

desc.spec: Install new electrical wiring and outlets.
desc.desc: Ensure the bathroom is up to code with modern electrical systems.

build.itemName: Install any necessary electrical switches, outlets, and GFCIs (ground fault circuit interrupter) as required.

desc.spec: Ensure all electrical points meet safety standards.
desc.desc: Install GFCIs in wet areas for safety.

build.itemName: Install or reposition any plumbing vents, drains, or gas lines.

desc.spec: Make adjustments to the plumbing system if needed.
desc.desc: Ensure proper venting and drainage.

build.itemName: Install cement board or waterproof backer board in areas where tile will be installed (walls of tub/shower).

desc.spec: Install waterproof materials to ensure tiles stick and resist water damage.
desc.desc: This is particularly important in high-moisture areas.

build.itemName: Apply waterproofing membrane or sealant in the shower and tub areas.

desc.spec: Apply waterproofing layers to ensure water doesn’t damage the structure.
desc.desc: Focus on shower and bathtub areas.

build.itemName: Lay a new subfloor if needed, ensuring it is level and stable.

desc.spec: Ensure the subfloor is solid and level before proceeding with other flooring installations.
desc.desc: Fix any structural issues in the floor.

build.itemName: Install underlayment if using tile or other flooring that requires it.

desc.spec: Install underlayment as per the manufacturer’s guidelines.
desc.desc: Ensure the underlayment is properly aligned and secured.

build.itemName: If using non-tile flooring (e.g., vinyl, luxury vinyl plank, or wood-look tiles), install per manufacturer guidelines.

desc.spec: Install alternative flooring such as vinyl or wood-look tiles.
desc.desc: Ensure adherence to the product’s installation guidelines.

working.itemName: Prepare final drawing packages for approval and distribution.

desc.desc: Submit the package for approval and distribute it to the team members.

build.itemName: Shut off electrical supply to the bedroom if needed.

desc.spec: Ensure that the power supply is turned off before starting any electrical work.
desc.desc: Safety is crucial when working with electrical systems.

build.itemName: Remove existing furniture and fixtures.

desc.spec: Carefully remove any existing furniture or fixtures that are being replaced.
desc.desc: Ensure that items are properly disposed of or stored if needed.

build.itemName: Take down old wall coverings or paint.

desc.spec: Remove any old wallpaper or paint that may be outdated.
desc.desc: Prepare the walls for new paint or wall coverings.

build.itemName: Install new electrical outlets, switches, and light fixtures.

desc.spec: Install new electrical outlets and light fixtures as per the new room layout.

build.itemName: Install new furniture (bed, dresser, nightstands, etc.)

build.itemName: Install window treatments (curtains, blinds, etc.)

build.itemName: Install new light fixtures and ceiling fans if applicable.

desc.spec: Install light fixtures or ceiling fans to provide sufficient lighting and comfort.
desc.desc: Ensure proper installation and functionality.

build.itemName: Final touch-ups (decor items, artwork, mirrors, etc.)

desc.spec: Add final decorative items such as artwork, mirrors, and accessories.
desc.desc: Ensure the room is styled according to the design scheme.
